old: 滅びの渦で暗黒の大竜晶を破壊する
new: Destroy the Dark Dragon Crystal in the Vortex of Stagnation.

old:
魔赤島、フィンダム、アッカ―シェランの地域素材が
入手可能なダンジョン/期間解放スポットをクリアする
※聖炎の参竜道を除く
new: In order to obtain regional materials from the islands of Bloodbane Isle, Phindym, and Acre Selund, you need to clear specific dungeons or temporarily unlocked locations. Please note that this does not include the Sacred Flame Path.
